alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Lower Jefferson; Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Southern Orange; Tyler; Upper Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 30 at 9:17PM CDT until August 31 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...FIRE DANGER THURSDAY... ...BURN BAN CONTINUES FOR ALL OF LOUISIANA AND SOUTHEAST TEXAS... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM CDT THURSDAY FOR LOW HUMIDITY AND VERY DRY FUELS FOR ALL OF SOUTHEAST TEXAS AS WELL AS CENTRAL AND SOUTHWEST LOUISIANA AND PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL LOUISIANA... * AFFECTED AREA...Vernon, Rapides, Avoyelles, Beauregard, Allen, Evangeline, St. Landry, Lafayette, Upper St. Martin, Lower St. Martin, West Cameron, East Cameron, Northern Calcasieu, Northern Jefferson Davis, Northern Acadia, Upper Vermilion, Upper Iberia, Upper St. Mary, Tyler, Hardin, Southern Calcasieu, Southern Jefferson Davis, Southern Acadia, Northern Jasper, Northern Newton, Southern Jasper, Southern Newton, Upper Jefferson, Northern Orange, Lower Jefferson and Southern Orange. * TIMING...10 AM until 8 PM Thursday. * WINDS...Sustained north-northeast winds around 10 with gusts up to 20 MPH. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...20 to 30%. * TEMPERATURES...95 to 100F. * LIGHTNING...Less than a 10% chance of showers and storms across SETX and SWLA. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Burn bans are in effect across Louisiana and Southeast Texas.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Hardin; Lower Jefferson; Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Southern Orange; Tyler; Upper Jefferson
